name.ja: <ruby>秘<rt>ひ</rt></ruby><ruby>密<rt>みつ</rt></ruby><ruby>ＦＩＬＥ<rt>ファイル</rt></ruby>３０００－ファイナル<ruby>惨<rt>さん</rt></ruby><ruby>劇<rt>げき</rt></ruby>

requirement.en: When an opponent's monster declares an attack while you have 3 face-up LIGHT Attribute Reptile Type monsters on your field, shuffle 3 LIGHT Attribute Reptile Type monsters from your Graveyard into the Deck.

effect.en: Destroy all Attack Position monsters on your opponent's field. Then, inflict 3000 damage to your opponent.
